name: Fried Cabbage with Bacon, Onion, and Garlic
author: Kathi Richards Smith
summary: This is a family favorite that is put into every cookbook for my kids when they move out and get married. It is a beautiful dish with many colors and full of flavor. Warning, it is addictive.
ingredients: 1 large head cabbage, cored and sliced
directions: Place the bacon in a large stockpot and cook over medium-high heat until crispy, about 10 minutes
Add the onion and garlic; cook and stir until the onion caramelizes; about 10 minutes
Immediately stir in the cabbage and continue to cook and stir another 10 minutes
Season with salt, pepper, onion powder, garlic powder, and paprika
Reduce heat to low, cover, and simmer, stirring occasionally, about 30 minutes more
